Date: Sunday, 2/9/1986
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
1B Don Audet
in return for
LF Wenceslao Martinez.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Halifax GM



Date: Thursday, 4/3/1986
Subject: Albert Monarrez learns new position
Albert Monarrez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Progress of Eddie Hughs
Dear Sir,
Eddie Hughs is doing pretty good at AA Patriot Games!
He has an ERA of 1.51, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Lorenzo Fuensanta
Dear Sir,
Lorenzo Fuensanta shouldn't play at AA Patriot Games!
He has an AVG of .204 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
